name: The Cultist Tales
description:
For too long  have the simple peasants roamed the land with their pointless joy and happiness. The Old One call you to do his biding and claim enough blood to summon he who shall rule once more!

Objective: Locate the needed sacrifces in your questlog and slay them.

Controls:
Movement- WASD
Climb ladders: W & S
Jump: SPACE
Collect: E
Throw: E
Show Questlog: R
